title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for Scientific Concept Formation on Material Composition

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least five misconceptions related to the components of matter.
Teachers can design instructional scenarios that convert misconceptions into scientific concepts using concept-change strategies.
The effectiveness of concept-change activities in elementary-level simulation classes reaches at least 80%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
